mapper.select: select ue.id as enrollId, b.logo as businessLogo, a.title as activityTitle, a.activity_start_time as `date`, jr.region_name as `position`, date_format(ue.create_time, '%m/%d %H:%i') as enrollTime from tb_user_enroll ue left join tb_activity a on a.id = ue.activity_id left join const_jm_region jr on jr.id = a.jm_region_id left join tb_business b on b.id = a.business_id where ue.user_id = #{userId} order by ue.create_time desc
